## Internal docs & documentation access

This page provides access to internal documentation used within the HYDRA-EO project.
The materials listed here are intended for consortium members and ESA partners and
should not be shared outside the project unless explicitly approved.

::: {.card-grid}

::: {.vbl-card}
<div class="pill-mini">Docs</div>

### Methodological documentation

Methodological notes, protocol documents, and technical PDFs describing the processing
pipelines, modelling assumptions, and analysis workflows developed within HYDRA-EO.
:::

::: {.vbl-card}
<div class="pill-mini">Field</div>

### Field manuals & protocols

Internal field manuals covering disease scoring, sampling strategies, and experimental
protocols used across crop trials (e.g. olive, pistachio, potato).
:::

::: {.vbl-card}
<div class="pill-mini">ESA</div>

### Meetings & reporting

Meeting minutes, internal presentations, and ESA reporting templates supporting
project coordination, reviews, and contractual reporting.
:::

:::
